entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:13 p.m. ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:16 p.m. ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Western Head 2:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 4.5°C
Wind: E 29 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Low 6. Forecast issued 9:28 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy with risk of a thundershower. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:28 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers or drizzle ending late in the evening then cloudy. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 9:28 PM ADT Sunday 30 April 2023
